attributes.action: Treat global warming as a "national emergency".
attributes.background: Parliaments across the world will not heed any warnings. The facts are simple: Our rainforest, which cannot grow back are disappearing, species going extinct every other day, typhoons, droughts fish and whales dying. There are now no places on earth not affected by microplastic. There is no planet B

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about global warming, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/240178
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253147
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245140
